title: "Study: Robots could soon be able to take care of these household tasks"
excerpt: "Nearly four in ten household tasks could be performed by robots within a decade, according to research based on the opinions of artificial intelligence experts. Shopping, cleaning and cooking are all chores for which robots will soon be able to lend a helping hand to humans."
